trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> has changed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um serviço de acompanhamento que implementa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>interface gera um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>eventos para notificar a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução que o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>para um determinado fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>mudou.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification>

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> and the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de acompanhamento usa um ProfileUpdatedEventArgs para fornecer o fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>e o novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a ProfileUpdatedEventArgs when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>usa um ProfileUpdatedEventArgs quando ele gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: When it receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will update the tracking profile for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: Quando ele recebe um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>evento, o infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução atualizará o perfil de rastreamento do fluxo de trabalho especificado <xref:System.Type>no cache do perfil.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar este construtor quando você gerar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>evento dentro de um serviço de controle, você deve definir explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class that specifies a new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs"> </xref> classe que especifica um novo <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> do fluxo de trabalho especificado <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> set to the specified profile.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>é criada com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>definido como especificado <xref:System.Type>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>definida para o perfil especificado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of workflow for which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>de fluxo de trabalho para o qual o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> mudou.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow Type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o novo <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> para o tipo de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução recebe um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>evento atualizará seu cache de perfil com o novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> para o tipo de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow whose <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Type>do fluxo de trabalho cujo <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> devem ser atualizadas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking profile has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>Especifica o fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>para que o perfil de rastreamento foi alterado.</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> is set to the new tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>é definido como o novo perfil de rastreamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução recebe um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>evento atualizará seu cache de perfil com o novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>de um fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Type>
